$ORCL New Press Release:  
  
San Francisco Giants Score with Oracle Cloud 
  
The 2021 National League West Division Champion San Francisco Giants have added Oracle MICROS Simphony Cloud Point of Sale (POS) to their roster. The POS technology will make it easy for fans to order the park's legendary food and beverage options at concession stands or from their mobile devices, giving them more time to enjoy the game. Behind the scenes, built-in restaurant business analytics and real-time data access will help Oracle Park improve inventory management to best serve guests while reducing food waste. The team has also moved its disaster recovery system for high-priority data, files and video to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI) from AWS. The San Francisco Giants have added O (...)

$ORCL Oracle initiated with a Neutral at Daiwa 
 
Daiwa analyst Stephen Bersey initiated coverage of Oracle with a Neutral rating and $87 price target. The analyst likes the company's cloud offerings, applications, and technology, but say its trading multiple is near a level that is appropriate. He sees a lack of a near-term catalysts for the shares.
